definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
the left-radical form of Kangxi radical 145, 衣[yi1]
surname Bu
see 蘿蔔|萝卜[luo2 bo5]
to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose
to replenish/to supplement/to complement/additional/supplementary/CL:個|个[ge4]
to compensate/to make up
to subsidize/subsidy/allowance/to supplement (one's salary etc)/benefit
to replace (a damaged component with a new one, an injured player with a substitute player, full-time workers with casual workers etc)/a substitute/a replacement
to complement/to make up for a deficiency
to subsidize/subsidy/allowance
to fill a gap/to fill in a blank (on a form)/to overcome a deficiency
complementary/to complement each other
to mend
supply/replenishment/to replenish
to make up missed lesson/to reschedule a class
patch (for mending clothes, tires etc)/(software) patch
to remedy
compensation
to make a report after the event/to make a supplementary report/to repay a kindness

sentences.english: A vacancy has arisen which I intend to fill.
sentences.chinese: 有一个职位空了出来，我想要补上。

sentences.english: With key type temperature supplement functions.
sentences.chinese: 设有锁匙式温度补正常功能。

sentences.english: In order to attack the target with big impact angle, over compensation of gravity is added to the design.
sentences.chinese: 为了实现大落角攻击目标，进行了末制导过重补设计。

sentences.english: It's time for motorists to take a class in map-reading skills.
sentences.chinese: 司机们应该在看地图技能方面补补课了。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo observe the effect of BFP on the immune system of patients with pulmonary heart disease in the remission stage.
sentences.chinese: 补肺片对支气管哮喘患者具有增强免疫功能作用。

sentences.english: So the pregnant woman must expect to note revamp iodination in the Yun.
sentences.chinese: 所以孕妇一定要在孕期注意补碘。

sentences.english: D: This tooth is too bad to be filled any more. It has to be pulled.
sentences.chinese: 这个牙齿坏得太厉害，已经不能补了，必须把它拔掉。

sentences.english: We also spent a late night squid fishing on the open ocean under a crescent moon.
sentences.chinese: 更于一个夜晚，在一轮明月下，无涯海面上网补鱿鱼。

sentences.english: What is the logic behind offering or not offering Qada' for Prayers missed during menstruation?
sentences.chinese: 在经期缺失的礼拜可以还补或不能还补的依据是什么？

sentences.english: Give me some cloth to patch your trousers.
sentences.chinese: 给我一点布来补你的裤子。

sentences.english: Today, my boyfriend talked me into having drunk sex.
sentences.chinese: 今天我男朋友说咱们不如来场醉后补魔吧。

sentences.english: Sharp decline in prices drop positions, empty every keyed complement actions alone.
sentences.chinese: 价跌持仓量大幅递减，空单有逢低回补动作。

sentences.english: Please tell Liu Qiang to make up today's.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉刘强把今天的功课补上。

sentences.english: Just bung in some old bricks to fill up the hole.
sentences.chinese: 填些旧砖就可以补上这个洞。

sentences.english: Sonny handed the toll taker the dollar bill and waited for his change.
sentences.chinese: 桑儿把大钞票递给收费员，等人家补零钱。
